text: Oppland is a former county in Norway. It has borders with counties of Trøndelag, Møre og Romsdal, Sogn og Fjordane, Buskerud, Akershus, Oslo, and Hedmark. The capital was in the town of Lillehammer. On 1 January 2020, the neighbouring counties of Oppland and Hedmark were merged to form the new county of Innlandet. == References == Category:Former counties of Norway Category:Innlandet
title: Oppland
